title: StickerTalk Handicap Do Not Block Door Magnet, 10 inches by 3 inches
features: High quality magnetic material. Professionally made in the USA.
Laminated for extra protection. Will provide years of life in outdoor environments.
Printed with solvent based inks that are waterproof, scratch and UV resistant.
Magnets require special care. Please read enclosed instructions carefully.
description: 10in x 3in (254mm x 76.2mm) Handicap Do Not Block Door MagnetHandicap Do Not Block Door Magnet Description:This magnet is 10 inches wide by 3 inches tall when applied. The words, PLEASE DO NOT BLOCK MY DOOR, are printed in blue letters near the top of the magnet. The words, THIS VEHICLE NEEDS ROOM TO LOAD, are printed below in black letters. A blue handicap symbol is printed on the right side of the magnet. The magnet's background is white. The pink line in the image shows where the magnet is cut. The pink line is not printed on the magnet. This quality-made product is durable and easily visible, making it a great tool to help ensure sufficient room for loading and unloading wheelchairs. However, it only attracts ferromagnetic metals.
